info.name: QuickMart Complete API Collection (Fixed)
info.description: Comprehensive and accurate API collection for the complete QuickMart platform

item.name: üõí QuickMart Backend APIs
item.description: E-commerce backend APIs for authentication, products, coupons, and admin operations

request.description: Login user and return JWT token (triggers churn prediction)
Get products with filtering and pagination
Get all available coupons for general use
Get user-specific coupons (from nudges and assignments)
Validate a coupon for an order
Apply a coupon to an order
Internal endpoint to assign a coupon from a nudge (called by RecoEngine)
Load all data (categories, products, users, coupons) from JSON files
Get all products from database (admin view)
Get all users from database (admin view, no passwords)

  "valid_until": "2025-12-31T23:59:59",

  "created_by_system": "admin"
}

request.description: Create a new coupon (used by RecoEngine for churn prevention)

item.name: ü§ñ RecoEngine APIs
item.description: Churn prediction, feature ingestion, and nudge engine APIs

request.description: Check RecoEngine health and model status
Get monitoring metrics for API performance and model accuracy
Predict churn probability for a user (triggers nudges if high risk)
Get a specific nudge rule by ID
Test which nudge rules would match for given parameters

query.description: Number of training samples to generate (100-10000)
Clear existing training data before generating new

request.description: Get current training status and model information
Get detailed training metrics from the last training job
Check the quality of training data in Aerospike
